label: TradeProductFeature
comment: Distinctive or characteristic parts of a trade product.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A catch phrase, expressed as text, for marketing of this trade product feature.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A marketing measure for this trade product feature.

referencedBy.comment: A marketing feature of this trade product.
